page.title: 20CHILDREN OF GLADESTRY,POWYS
page.content:
These are all the children in the Junior Class at Gladestry School, who compiled this information. The fifteen children in the Infant Class did not take part.
Deborah Mills (11) Little Wernwilla Joy Rogers(11) Cloggau, Colva Gareth Berrington(10) Gwerndyfnant Justin Griffiths(10) Gwaithla Thomas Bullough(10) Llanhowell Joanne Hughes(9) Sunnymead Kate Penning(9) Oak House,Newchurch Richard Harvey(9) Pentwyn Joelene Griffiths(8) Gwaithla Martin Ingram(8) Cil-Bigyn Daniel Cambridge(7) Summerpole,Brilley Oliver Bullough(7) Llanhowell
Robert Hughes M.A.(Oxon),Headmaster Cil-y-Nant, Gladestry
